forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow during the morning will become a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 39F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to rain during the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to rain during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
